property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'What does it do?' Whatever I bloody want it to do." -Director Haas

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, trash 1 program. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sagittarius promised foresight, but brought only regret.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 2||Trash one Program.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, do 1 net damage. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gemini promised pleasure, but dealt only pain.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 2||Inflict 1 Net Damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score License Acquisition, install and rez an asset or upgrade from Archives or HQ, ignoring all costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've received seventeen crates from ChiLo. We'll hit stores the same day we sign the licence agreement."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you draw a card each turn, draw 1 additional card. Add 1 of the drawn cards to the bottom of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A new investment deal every morning! Grab the bull by the horns and take control of your future!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: All barrier ice have +1 strength. When you score Superior Cyberwalls, gain 1[Credits] for each rezzed barrier.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our new barriers will be built on the rubble of our enemies".

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[Credits]. 1[Credits],[Trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[Credits]||1[Credits],[Trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lycan can be advanced. While Lycan has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains code gate and loses sentry. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It’s weird. I hit the server again and it was like a totally different piece of ice was waiting for me. Lost my root daemon. I shouldn’t have nested them seven deep."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trace3 - If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last thing he saw was the tattoo of a strange beast on his captor’s neck. It had a goat’s head, the body of a lion, and the tail of a serpent. Then the bag was yanked over his head, and there was only darkness.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Grail-AP

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [Subroutine] Do 2 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He who holds the staff of wisdom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You cannot use Shell Corporation more than once per turn. [Click]: Place 3[Credits] on Shell Corporation. [Click]: Take all credits from Shell Corporation.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Click]: Place 3 [Credits] from the bank on Shell Corporation.||[Click]: Take all credits from Shell Corporation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your memory limit is equal to the number of cards in your grip. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes you just need a brain in a jar" -g00ru

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 4 power counters on Cerberus "Cuj.0" H3 when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He only likes to eat live meat." -MaxX

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Trained Pragmatist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 4 power counters on Cerberus "Rex" H2 when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Useful for fetching all sorts of things…but you better have a treat ready if he likes it." -Iain Stirling

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 1[Credits] on Zona Sul Shipping when your turn begins. [Click]: Take all credits from Zona Sul Shipping. Trash Zona Sul Shipping if you are tagged.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They’ll deliver anything to anywhere. Make sure to request air holes if you’re shipping someone important, though."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Recurring Credits] Use this credit to install programs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cybsoft started by designing games. Eventually they just redesigned the same game each year, and to combat piracy created a dedicated machine to play it. Profits grew ten-fold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 4 power counters on Cerberus "Lady" H1 when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, instead of accessing cards, you may install Utopia Shard from your grip, ignoring all costs. [Trash]: The Corp discards 2 cards from HQ at random. Limit 1 per deck.
